author: Anonymous Comp
title: Midterm 1 Earplugs
question:
Hello,
I was wondering if we are allowed to wear earplugs during the midterm to block out ambient noise. The mitdterm 1 page mentioned that earbuds/headphones of any kind are not permitted, although would earplugs fall under this category as they are not electronic?
instructor_answer: Non-electronic earplugs are fine, though you will need to ensure that you do not miss any announcements or messages from the invigilators.
